description: [REvil](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0496) can check the system language using GetUserDefaultUILanguage and GetSystemDefaultUILanguage. If the language is found in the list, the process terminates.(Citation: Kaspersky Sodin July 2019)

external_references.description: Mamedov, O, et al. (2019, July 3). Sodin ransomware exploits Windows vulnerability and processor architecture. Retrieved August 4, 2020.
